targets.rawSql:
select 
      sum( CASE WHEN (b->>'used_g')::float = 0.0 and material_used > 0 and most_mat = $materials and most_mat = (b->>'type')::text THEN material_used  ELSE ( (b->>'used_g')::float * (progress_done / 100) ) END),
       (b->>'type')::text as material
      from (
            SELECT JSONB_ARRAY_ELEMENTS(filament_data) as b, progress_done, material as most_mat, material_used
            from prints 
            where jsonb_array_length(filament_data) != 0 
            and printer = '${printers}' 
            and $__timeFilter(start_time)
      ) as foo 
      where (b->>'type')::text = $materials group by material

select 
      sum(case when prints.status = 'RUNNING' or prints.status = 'PAUSED' then EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM ((now() at time zone 'utc') - start_time)) else EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (end_time - start_time))end),
       material from prints where $__timeFilter(start_time) and material = $materials and printer = '${printers}' group by material

select 
      sum(kwh) as "KwH",
       material from prints where $__timeFilter(start_time) and material = $materials and printer = '${printers}' group by material

select 
      sum( CASE WHEN (b->>'used_cost')::float = 0.0 and material_used_cost > 0 and most_mat = $materials and most_mat = (b->>'type')::text THEN material_used_cost  ELSE ( (b->>'used_cost')::float * (progress_done / 100) ) END),
      (b->>'type')::text as material 
      from (
            SELECT JSONB_ARRAY_ELEMENTS(filament_data) as b , progress_done, material_used_cost, material as most_mat
            from prints 
            where jsonb_array_length(filament_data) != 0 
            and printer = '${printers}' 
            and $__timeFilter(start_time)
      ) as foo 
      where (b->>'type')::text = $materials group by material

WITH numbered_filaments AS (
  -- Calculates relevant print job data
  SELECT
    p.printer,
    p.start_time,
    p.name,
    p.status,
    p.material_used,
    p.material_used_cost,
    p.filament_data,
    p.plate_type,
    CASE
      WHEN p.material_type = 'resin' THEN 'ml'
      ELSE 'g'
    END AS material_unit,
    CASE
      WHEN p.status IN ('RUNNING', 'PAUSED') THEN (t.kwh - p.initial_kwh)
      ELSE p.kwh
    END AS kwh,
    CASE
      WHEN p.status IN ('RUNNING', 'PAUSED') THEN ((t.kwh - p.initial_kwh) * (p.electric_rate / 100))
      ELSE p.electric_cost
    END AS electric_cost,
    CASE
      WHEN p.status IN ('RUNNING', 'PAUSED') THEN EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM ((now() AT TIME ZONE 'utc') - p.start_time))
      ELSE EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (p.end_time - p.start_time))
    END AS duration,
    p.progress_done  -- Include progress_done directly from the prints table
  FROM prints p
  JOIN (
    SELECT kwh, printer
    FROM energy_reading
    WHERE printer = '${printers}'
    LIMIT 1
  ) t ON p.printer = t.printer
  WHERE $__timeFilter(p.start_time)
    AND p.printer = '${printers}'
    AND p.name NOT IN (${ignored})
    AND (
      CASE
        WHEN p.status IN ('RUNNING', 'PAUSED') THEN (t.kwh - p.initial_kwh)
        ELSE p.kwh
      END
    ) > ${minkwh}
),
filament_data_expanded AS (
  -- Expands filament data from JSON format
  SELECT
    nf.printer,
    nf.start_time,
    nf.name,
    nf.status,
    nf.material_used,
    nf.material_used_cost,
    nf.filament_data,
    nf.plate_type,
    nf.material_unit,
    nf.kwh,
    nf.electric_cost,
    nf.duration,
    nf.progress_done,  -- Include progress_done in the CTE
    jsonb_data->>'vendor' AS vendor,
    CASE
      WHEN jsonb_data ? 'colour' AND jsonb_data->>'colour' IS NOT NULL AND jsonb_data->>'colour' <> '' THEN jsonb_data->>'colour'
      ELSE '#FFFFFF' -- Default to white when no color is present
    END AS color,
    COALESCE(jsonb_data->>'type', ' ') AS material_type,  -- Ensure material_type is always a string
    (jsonb_data->>'used_g')::numeric AS used_grams,
    jsonb_data->>'kg_cost' AS kg_cost,
    jsonb_data->>'used_cost' AS used_cost
  FROM numbered_filaments nf
  JOIN jsonb_array_elements(nf.filament_data::jsonb) AS jsonb_data ON true
),
material_summary AS (
  -- Summarizes material usage by type, vendor, and color
  SELECT
    printer,
    start_time,
    name,
    COALESCE(MIN(vendor), '') AS vendor,
    material_type,
    color,
    SUM(used_grams) AS total_used_g,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY printer, start_time, name, material_type, vendor, md5(concat(material_type, vendor, color))) AS rn,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY printer, start_time, name) AS row_number
  FROM filament_data_expanded
  GROUP BY printer, start_time, name, material_type, vendor, color, md5(concat(material_type, vendor, color))
),
final_materials AS (
  -- Assigns material details and row numbers per print job
  SELECT
    ms.printer,
    ms.start_time,
    ms.name,
    ms.vendor,
    ms.material_type,
    ms.color,
    ms.total_used_g,
    ms.row_number,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY ms.start_time, ms.name ORDER BY ms.material_type, ms.color) AS rn
  FROM material_summary ms
)
SELECT
  nf.printer,
  nf.start_time,
  nf.name,
  nf.status,
  nf.kwh,
  nf.electric_cost,
  nf.duration,
  nf.material_used,
  nf.material_used_cost,
  nf.material_unit,
  nf.filament_data,
  nf.plate_type,
  nf.progress_done,  -- Include progress_done in the final output
  COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN fm.rn = 1 THEN fm.material_type END), ' ') AS material_type_1,
  MAX(CASE WHEN fm.rn = 1 THEN fm.vendor END) AS vendor_1,
  MAX(CASE WHEN fm.rn = 1 THEN fm.total_used_g END) AS material_used_1,
  COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN fm.rn = 2 THEN fm.material_type END), ' ') AS material_type_2,
  MAX(CASE WHEN fm.rn = 2 THEN fm.vendor END) AS vendor_2,
  MAX(CASE WHEN fm.rn = 2 THEN fm.total_used_g END) AS material_used_2,
  COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN fm.rn = 3 THEN fm.material_type END), ' ') AS material_type_3,
  MAX(CASE WHEN fm.rn = 3 THEN fm.vendor END) AS vendor_3,
  MAX(CASE WHEN fm.rn = 3 THEN fm.total_used_g END) AS material_used_3,
  COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN fm.rn = 4 THEN fm.material_type END), ' ') AS material_type_4,
  MAX(CASE WHEN fm.rn = 4 THEN fm.vendor END) AS vendor_4,
  MAX(CASE WHEN fm.rn = 4 THEN fm.total_used_g END) AS material_used_4,
  MAX(CASE WHEN fm.rn = 1 THEN fm.color END) AS color_1,
  MAX(CASE WHEN fm.rn = 2 THEN fm.color END) AS color_2,
  MAX(CASE WHEN fm.rn = 3 THEN fm.color END) AS color_3,
  MAX(CASE WHEN fm.rn = 4 THEN fm.color END) AS color_4,
  MAX(CASE WHEN fm.rn = 1 THEN fm.row_number END) AS row_1,
  MAX(CASE WHEN fm.rn = 1 THEN fm.row_number END) AS row_2,
  MAX(CASE WHEN fm.rn = 1 THEN fm.row_number END) AS row_3,
  MAX(CASE WHEN fm.rn = 1 THEN fm.row_number END) AS row_4
FROM numbered_filaments nf
JOIN final_materials fm ON nf.printer = fm.printer
                          AND nf.start_time = fm.start_time
                          AND nf.name = fm.name
GROUP BY
  nf.printer, nf.start_time, nf.name, nf.status, nf.kwh, nf.electric_cost, nf.duration, nf.material_used, nf.material_used_cost, nf.material_unit, nf.filament_data, nf.plate_type, nf.progress_done
ORDER BY nf.start_time DESC;

SELECT kwh as "kWh", 
      ((rate / 100) * kwh ) as "Cost" 
FROM (
        SELECT printer, electric_rate as rate ,
               kwh FROM energy_reading
               WHERE printer = '${printers}'
        --WHERE $__timeFilter(read_time)
        LIMIT 1
    )
 t WHERE printer = '${printers}'

SELECT sum(kwh) as "kWh", 
sum(electric_cost) as "Cost" 
FROM prints 
WHERE --$__timeFilter(start_time) AND 
printer = '${printers}' and prints.name not in (${ignored})

SELECT (total.kwh - print.kwh) as "kWh", 
       (total.cost - print.cost) as "Cost" 
from  (SELECT sum(kwh) as "kwh", 
              sum(electric_cost) as "cost"
       FROM prints WHERE 
       --$__timeFilter(start_time) AND 
       printer = '${printers}' and name not in (${ignored})) print, 
      (SELECT kwh as "kwh",
             ((rate / 100) * kwh ) as "cost" 
      FROM 
          (SELECT printer, electric_rate as rate ,
                   kwh FROM energy_reading 
          WHERE-- $__timeFilter(read_time) AND
           printer = '${printers}'
           LIMIT 1) 
      t) 
total

select 
      sum(((b->>'used_g')::float * (progress_done / 100)))as "Amount", sum(((b->>'used_cost')::float) * (progress_done / 100)) as "Cost",  (CASE when material_type = 'resin' then 'ml' else 'g' end) as "material_unit"
      from (
            SELECT JSONB_ARRAY_ELEMENTS(filament_data) as b, material_type, progress_done
            from prints 
            where jsonb_array_length(filament_data) != 0 
            and printer = '${printers}' 
            and $__timeFilter(start_time)
      ) as foo group by material_type

list.definition: select distinct printer from prints where material_type = 'filament';
list.label: Printer
list.name: printers
list.query: select distinct printer from prints where material_type = 'filament';

list.definition: select distinct(b->>'type') from (select JSONB_ARRAY_ELEMENTS(filament_data) as b from prints where jsonb_array_length( filament_data ) != 0 and printer = '${printers}' ) as foo
list.label: Materials
list.name: materials
list.query: select distinct(b->>'type') from (select JSONB_ARRAY_ELEMENTS(filament_data) as b from prints where jsonb_array_length( filament_data ) != 0 and printer = '${printers}' ) as foo
